item.description: Did you guys know that Portuguese is the colonial language of Mozambique? Tōmn just back from Rio de Janeiro and Kina Zoré, afro-pop by way of Mozambique, will be playing this show. http://www.facebook.c... Here's a little more on the performers: 10PM - Olinde (sweet acoustic siren songs) With a voice that inspires memories of the jazz divas of old and Jewel, Olinde emotes acoustic soulful, acoustic siren songs that enchant and charm. myspace.com/olindemandell 11PM - Tōmn (american indie folk/brazilian dream pop) Tōmn, just back from Rio de Janeiro, mixes indie folk with the brazilian dream pop and rhythms to create immense textures. Drawing from artists like Bon Iver, Beck and Marisa Monte his music soothes and then rocks you through its peaks and valleys. tomnmusic.com 12PM - Kina Zore (hip-shakin afro-pop from Mozambique) Kina Zore, headed by Mozambican singer Helder Tsinine presents rootsy, Marrabenta grooves that will make you shake it like until the wee hours. Think Thomas Mapfumo, Fela Kuti and Bob Marley all in one wonderful potion. kinazore.com Friday, October 14th Johnny D's $10 21+ johnnyds.com

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Olinde, Tomn & Kina Zor√© at Johnny D's!
